recipes.title: Classic Pancakes
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together milk, melted butter, egg, and vanilla.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and grease lightly.
Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake. Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook until golden.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1/4 cup pasta water and drain.
Heat olive oil in a pan over low heat. Add garlic and chili flakes, sauté until golden.
Add drained spaghetti and toss well. If needed, add reserved pasta water to loosen.
Season with salt. Garnish with parsley and Parmesan if desired.
